original_title: Joe Woke Up at 6AM on a Monday
overview: Joe wakes up at 6AM on a Monday. He gets up, and changes out of his pyjamas. He makes himself the same breakfast he always does. He brushes his teeth, puts on his socks and shoes, and gets his briefcase filled with very important papers. He's ready for work. It's 6:30AM. As he goes to leave his house, his vision slowly goes black, and he collapses to the floor.
title: Joe Woke Up at 6AM on a Monday
